title: Heating Appliances: Heating Appliances Sales Soar in Patna | Increase in Demand Amid Bone-Chilling Cold |
text: Patna: Amid bone-chilling cold, the demand for heating appliances has increased manifold in the city. Traders said the sales were poor till the first week of January, but people started thronging the shops to buy heating appliances once the mercury plunged.Navin Kumar, who owns an electric appliance shop on Boring Road, said keeping in mind the chilling weather conditions last year, a large quantity of heating gadgets was stocked. “Very few customers turned up in the first week of January, making us apprehensive of huge loss. However, the weather started changing after January 10 and the minimum temperature was recorded below 10 degrees Celsius on January 13 and 14. The sales, therefore, increased by 20% when compared to last year. We hope that the cold weather will continue for some more days,” he added.Products like room heaters, blowers, geysers and immersion rods are selling like hot cakes in the city markets. The shops have a wide variety of products, including branded and local ones of every range.R S Jeet Singh, an electrical shop owner at Chandni Market, said, “We have a wide variety of heating gadgets, starting from Rs 200 to Rs 18,000. The non-branded blowers are available at Rs 800-Rs 900, while the branded blowers are in the price range of Rs 900 to Rs 2,500. The cost of the room heaters depends on the number of halogens installed in them. Non-branded single to double rod halogen heaters are available at Rs 300 to Rs 700, while the branded ones are available in the price range of Rs 800 to Rs 1,600.”Geysers of various capacities are also in high demand. “The geysers are priced between Rs 3,400 and Rs 12,000 as per the capacity.
